values.title: Empathy and Compassion
values.description: A commitment to understanding and sharing the feelings of clients, fostering a compassionate and non-judgmental therapeutic relationship

values.title: Ethical Practice
values.description: Adherence to a strong ethical framework, including confidentiality, informed consent, and a commitment to the well-being and rights of clients

values.title: Cultural sensitivity
values.description: Recognition and respect for the diverse backgrounds, cultures, and identities of clients, with a commitment to providing culturally sensitive and inclusive care

values.title: Client-Centered Approach
values.description: Prioritizing the client's needs, goals, and autonomy in the therapeutic process, fostering collaboration and shared decision-making
